plot: This Universal "Name Band Musical" highlights the popular banjo player Eddie Peabody and the Sonny Burke Orchestra, with contributions by Barbara Perry, The Cheer Leaders and the Red Norvo ...
title: Eddie Peabody and Sonny Burke's Orchestra
